StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: NHLBI TOPMed: Genetic Variation of Heart, Lung, and Kidney Disease in Sickle Cell Disease: Pre- and Post-Curative Therapies (HLK-SCD)

Person.Organization: WASHINGTON UNIVERSITYAMERICAN SOCIETY OF HEMATOLOGYVANDERBILT UNIVERSITY MEDICAL CENTERVANDERBILT UNIVERSITY
VANDERBILT UNIVERSITY MEDICAL CENTERUNIVERSITY OF TENNESSEE KNOXVILLE

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The TOPMed acknowledgement statement can be found at: https://topmed.nhlbi.nih.gov/acknowledgements. In addition, please include: "Whole genome sequencing (WGS) for the Trans-Omics in Precision Medicine (TOPMed) program was supported by the National Heart, Lung and Blood Institute (NHLBI). WGS for NHLBI TOPMed: Genetic Variation of Heart, Lung, and Kidney Disease in Sickle Cell Disease: Pre- and Post-Curative Therapies was performed at University of Washington Northwest Genomics Center (HHSN268201100037C). Centralized read mapping and genotype calling, along with variant quality metrics and filtering were provided by the TOPMed Informatics Research Center (3R01HL-117626-02S1). Phenotype harmonization, data management, sample-identity QC, and general study coordination were provided by the TOPMed Data Coordinating Center (3R01HL-120393-02S1). We gratefully acknowledge the studies and participants who provided biological samples and data for TOPMed.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. This study requires documentation of annual IRB approval. Only full or expedited approvals will be accepted.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.
Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide annual documentation of local IRB approval. Only full or expedited approvals will be accepted.

ConsentGroup.title: Exchange Area (IRB, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: EA-IRB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use by NHLBI WGS study investigators only There are two consent group for this study: 1) GRU-NPU: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. 2) GRU-IRB: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide annual documentation of local IRB approval. Only full or expedited approvals will be accepted.
